spell_tooltip.description: Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Heals the target for 562,903 over 17 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 208,039 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Shift into Cat Form and increase your movement speed by 200%, reducing gradually over 5 sec.
Tosses the enemy target into the air, disorienting them but making them invulnerable for up to 5 sec. Only one target can be affected by your Cyclone at a time.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, instantly heal for 10% of your health.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 90 sec.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 293,788 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.

Heals the target for 382,294 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 224,016.

May be active on one target at a time.

Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 4 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.

Healing is increased by 8% for each of your active Rejuvenations.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 199,574 over 9 sec.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Ysera's Gift now heals every 4 sec and its healing is increased by 8% for each of your active Rejuvenations.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 29,364 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.6 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 45 yards for 1.5 million over 4.1 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 9,416 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.

The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 16 sec.

Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 140,555.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 42,195. Lasts 15 sec.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 27,370 over 6 sec.
Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
Rejuvenation healing is increased by up to 30%, and Tranquility healing is increased by up to 30%, healing for more on low-health targets.

Nourish
Regrowth decreases the cast time of your next Nourish by 33% and causes it to receive an additional 33% bonus from Mastery: Harmony. Stacks up to 3 times.

Grove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 50,130 over 7 sec.
Wild Growth's healing falls off 15% less over time.
Allies protected by your Ironbark also receive 75% of the healing from each of your active Rejuvenations and Ironbark's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 19,281 over 6 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage 25% faster, and your healing over time effects heal 5% faster.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Rejuvenation instantly heals your target for 15% of its total periodic effect and Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec.
When your Rejuvenation heals a full health target, its duration is increased by 2 sec, up to a maximum total increase of 4 sec per cast.

Extends the duration of all of your heal over time effects on friendly targets within 60 yards by 6 sec, and increases the rate of your heal over time effects by 25% for 8 sec.

Affected allies are healed for 1.2 million, split evenly among them.
Wild Growth has a 60% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to 2 additional allies within 20 yards of the target.
You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target. Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 2 sec.

Rip and Rake damage has a chance to cause Bloodseeker Vines to grow on the victim, dealing 161,438 Bleed damage over 6 sec.

Wild Growth, Regrowth, and Efflorescence healing has a chance to cause Symbiotic Blooms to grow on the target, healing for 142,822 over 6 sec.

Multiple instances of these can overlap.

Damage and healing while in Cat Form increased by 3%.

Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.

Attacking from Prowl increases the chance for Shred, Rake, and Swipe to critically strike by 8% for 6 sec.

Casting Regrowth increases the chance for your periodic heals to critically heal by 8% for 10 sec.

Rip and Ferocious Bite damage increased by 5%.

Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom healing increased by 10%.
When you remove an effect with Soothe or Nature's Cure, gain a combo point and heal for 4% of your maximum health. If you are at full health an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
During Barkskin your movement speed is increased by 10% and every second flowers grow beneath your feet that heal up to 3 nearby injured allies for 18,079.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.

Each active Bloodseeker Vine increases the damage your abilities deal by 2%.

Each active Symbiotic Bloom increases the healing of your spells by 2%.

When Bloodseeker Vines expire or you use Ferocious Bite on their target they explode in thorns, dealing 119,583 physical damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced above 5 targets.

When Symbiotic Blooms expire or you cast Rejuvenation on their target flowers grow around their target, healing them and up to 3 nearby allies for 22,902.
When Bloodseeker Vines or Symbiotic Blooms grow, they have a 20% chance to cause another growth of the same type to immediately grow on a valid nearby target.

Bloodseeker Vines increase the damage your abilities deal to affected enemies by 5%.

Symbiotic Blooms increase the healing your spells do to affected targets by 20%.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Heals the target for 562,903 over 17 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 264,204 Arcane damage to the target, and 93,336 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 208,039 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 18,447 Nature damage and then an additional 231,098 Nature damage over 18 sec.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Shift into Cat Form and increase your movement speed by 200%, reducing gradually over 5 sec.
Tosses the enemy target into the air, disorienting them but making them invulnerable for up to 5 sec. Only one target can be affected by your Cyclone at a time.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, instantly heal for 10% of your health.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 90 sec.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 293,788 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.
Roots the target and all enemies within 12 yards in place for 10 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery

Rake the target for 42,779 Bleed damage and an additional 405,367 Bleed damage over 15 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.

Generates 8 Astral Power.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 453,550 Astral damage.

Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 411,565 over 8 sec
   2 points: 617,348 over 12 sec
   3 points: 823,131 over 16 sec
   4 points: 1 million over 20 sec
   5 points: 1.2 million over 24 sec

Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.

Casting 2 Starfires empowers Wrath for 15 sec. Casting 2 Wraths empowers Starfire for 15 sec.

 Eclipse (Solar)
Nature spells deal 15% additional damage and Wrath damage is increased by 40%.

 Eclipse (Lunar)
Arcane spells deal 15% additional damage and the damage Starfire deals to nearby enemies is increased by 30%.
Moonfire and Sunfire damage over time has a chance to call down a falling star, dealing 37,362 Astral damage and generating 2 Astral Power.
Summons a beam of solar light over an enemy target's location, interrupting the target and silencing all enemies within the beam. Lasts 8 sec.
During the first 6 sec of every Eclipse, Shooting Stars fall 200% more often.
Moonfire deals 10% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.
Your Wrath and Starfire chance to critically strike is increased by 10% and they generate 2 additional Astral Power.
When Eclipse ends or when you enter combat, enter a Dreamstate, reducing the cast time of your next 2 Starfires or Wraths by 40%.
Casting Starfall extends the duration of active Moonfires and Sunfires by 3.0 sec, up to 28 sec.
Your Starfire and Wrath damage has a 35% chance to cause the target to languish for an additional 60% of your spell's damage over 6 sec.

Solar Eclipse increases the damage of Wrath by an additional 20%. 

Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage by 15% and the damage it deals to nearby enemies by an additional 30%.

Sunfire damage has a chance to grow a magical mushroom at a target's location. After 1 sec, the mushroom detonates, dealing 243,766 Nature damage and then an additional 183,335 Nature damage over 10 sec. Affected targets are slowed by 50%.

Generates up to 20 Astral Power based on targets hit.
Solar Eclipse increases Wrath's Astral Power generation by 60% and Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage and Astral Power generation by 20% for each target hit beyond the first, up to 60%.

Casting Wrath in an Eclipse has a 18% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.

Casting Starfire in an Eclipse has a 25% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.
The critical strike damage of your Astral spells is increased by 20%.
Your Moonfire, Sunfire, and Stellar Flare deal damage 25% more frequently.
Shooting Stars has a 15% chance to instead call down a Crashing Star, dealing 110,338 Astral damage to the target and generating 4 Astral Power.
Wrath and Starfire have a 20% chance to cause your next Wrath or Starfire cast during an Eclipse to become Astral and deal 75% additional damage.

Starsurge and Starfall grant you 4% Haste for 15 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
Every 30th Shooting Star calls down a Full Moon at 60% effectiveness upon its target.
Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 20%, decreasing by 2% every 1 sec.
Consuming Umbral Embrace increases the damage of your Moonfire, Sunfire, Stellar Flare, Shooting Stars, and Starfall by 30% for 6 sec.
Starsurge and Starfall deal 8% increased damage and their cost is reduced by 10%.
Increases maximum Astral Power by 20. Entering Eclipse reduces the Astral Power cost of your next Starsurge or Starfall by 15.
Starsurge or Starfall increase your current Eclipse's Arcane or Nature damage bonus by an additional 2%, up to 6%.

Deals 257,760 Astral damage to the target and empowers New Moon to become Half Moon. 

Generates 10 Astral Power.
Your Moonfire and Sunfire have a chance to summon a Faerie Dragon to assist you in battle for 30 sec.

New Moon, Half Moon, and Full Moon deal 25% increased damage. Full Moon becomes Full Moon once more before resetting to New Moon.

Fury of Elune deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Free automatic Moonfires from Galactic Guardian generate 5 Rage.
Moonfire deals 20% additional damage.
Bear Form and Moonkin Form reduce Arcane damage taken by 6% and all other magic damage taken by 3%.
Each non-Arcane damaging ability you use increases the damage of your next Arcane damaging ability by 3%, stacking up to 3 times.
Enemies damaged by Lunar Beam or Fury of Elune take 6% increased damage from you for 6 sec.
Using Wild Charge while in Bear Form or Moonkin Form incurs a 3 sec shorter cooldown.
Thrash now deals Arcane damage and its damage is increased by 12%.

Moonfire damage has a chance to call down a Fury of Elune to follow your target for 3 sec.

 Fury of Elune
Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy, dealing 110,676 Astral damage over 3 sec within its area.

Generates 15 Astral Power over its duration.
All Arcane damage from your spells and abilities is increased by 3%.

Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

 Fury of Elune
The flash of energy now generates 6 Astral Power and its damage is increased by 50%.

 Full Moon
New Moon and Half Moon now also call down 1 Minor Moon.
